name: Crashed (Demented Soul)
description:
You have an accident with your friend and you wake up after the morning comes. And this is where your experience begins. 

For basic movement, use W to move forward, S to move backward, A to strafe left and, D to strafe right. Oh yeah and sometimes press E to interact with an object. 

Since the GDKO 2023 - Round 2 is about sound, please use headphones for a more exciting experience.
